title: Haircut & style
description: Every haircut is executed with precision and style. We promise you'll walk out of here looking your very best!

title: Custom Colours and Highlights
description: We make sure every client leaves with a colour that best suits them. We take in to careful consideration the clients needs and wants when choosing the perfect look!

title: Bridal Hair
description: We pride ourselves in our beautiful wedding styles. With 15-20 weddings booked annually, we have the tools, tricks and knowledge to having you look your very best on your special day!

title: Hair Extensions
description: Corrie, our extension tech is highly skilled and knows how to install virtually every type of hair extension. Book your consultation with Corrie today!
